node.title: 41yo truck driver charged over ambulance crash killing nurse and elderly patient
node.alt: Close-up shot of Scales of Justice statue in Brisbane CBD on August 1, 2018.
node.description: A man has been charged over the deaths of nurse Ray Wyeth and his 87-year-old patient, who were killed when his truck hit the ambulance they were travelling in west of Rockhampton last month.
node.content:
["A 41-year-old man has been charged over the deaths of nurse Ray Wyeth\u00a0and his 87-year-old patient, who were killed when his\u00a0truck hit\u00a0the ambulance they were travelling in at Stanwell\u00a0last month.", "Timothy Lee Wilson, of The Range,\u00a0was granted bail in the Rockhampton Magistrates Court this morning, charged with two counts of dangerous operation of motor vehicle causing deaths.", "Prosecutors allege that on October 10, Mr Wilson was driving a truck near Stanwell, west of Rockhampton, when it crashed into\u00a0the rear of an ambulance that was stationary at a temporary traffic light set-up for roadworks.", "Two people were killed in the incident, including 65-year-old nurse Ray Wyeth and an elderly\u00a0patient.", "Mr Wilson was taken to the Rockhampton hospital in a serious condition. The\u00a0paramedic who was driving the ambulance, along with two other passengers were also taken to hospital.", "", "
The roadworks are located near Stanwell on the Capricorn Highway, west of Rockhampton.(ABC Capricornia: Erin Semmler)
", "
Accused a 'significant flight risk'
", "Police prosecutor Jennifer Leach told the court she opposed bail, as police felt the accused was a significant flight risk, and that Mr Wilson's family initially 'provided no assistance' to police locating the defendant.", "She said at the time of the offence Mr Wilson was\u00a0under an intensive NSW corrections order in relation to another matter.", "Ms Leach alleged the defendant had exhibited 'dangerous habits on the road' in the lead-up to, and at the time of the incident.", "\"The defendant has been given adequate warning while\u00a0he travelled on the highway, observed by an 80-kilometre reduction sign, and then a 60-kilometre reduction sign\" Ms Leach said.", "She argued that both the emergency vehicle, and the large truck it was pushed into, would have been clearly visible on the highway.", "", "
Ray Wyeth\u00a0was\u00a0killed in October\u00a0when a truck collided with the rear of an ambulance he was travelling in.(Supplied)
", "Defence lawyer Rowan King told the court that the evidence was still not clear on what signs were visible in the lead-up to the accident, and that the charges could possibly be amended in the future.", "While reading from court documents, Mr King said his client had told police, \"I didn't see the signs. There were no signs\".", "\"[There is] nothing in the material about his manner of driving. It is not alleged he was under the influence or speeding,\" Mr King said.", "Mr King also told the court his client had sustained significant injuries in the incident, including a \"hole in his skill from when he hit the pavement when the truck rolled\".", "Magistrate Cameron Press told the court he was not satisfied that the accused presented an \"unacceptable risk of failing to appear\", and that he would grant bail under strict conditions.", "Mr Wilson must surrender his licence, not consume any alcohol or illicit substances, and\u00a0will appear before court again in January."]
